channel.title: Need help with my npc's ! as fast as possible!
channel.description:
i have 2 hours left till my server is launched to the space of internet and i don't know where or how to increase npc's def and make them hit more !! cuz they hit 0 all the time!
i need really fast help from all of u guys ! cmon!

item.title: Need help with my npc's ! as fast as possible!
item.dc:creator: @duhelis duhelis
item.description:
@duhelis wrote:

go into NpcHandler.java and add this with all like this

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == NpcID) { // npc id hitDiff = misc.random(12); // this is number that monster hit }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my npc's ! as fast as possible!
